pr_title: Revert setting of null to deposit tx id

timeline.message: Revert setting of deposit tx id to null
Remove duplicates when delivered from storage

timeline.bodyHTML: Suggested change
timeline.author: sqrrm

timeline.body: Don't you need a check that obj is actually a `WrapperTradeStatistics2` here? Could cause an exception otherwise.
timeline.bodyText: Don't you need a check that obj is actually a WrapperTradeStatistics2 here? Could cause an exception otherwise.
timeline.bodyHTML: Don't you need a check that obj is actually a WrapperTradeStatistics2 here? Could cause an exception otherwise.
timeline.author: sqrrm

replies.bodyText:
Could add it to make it safer if it is reused somewhere.
Atm using it like that should not cause this case to ever happen.
.map(WrapperTradeStatistics2::new)
.distinct()
replies.author: ripcurlx

replies.bodyText: But will add a check to be sure
replies.author: ripcurlx

replies.bodyText:
ah wait - I've added it already 😉
 if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) return false;
replies.author: ripcurlx

replies.bodyText: Oh, right, that's right, missed it.
replies.author: sqrrm
